title: Software Version
description: Schema for submitting a tagged version of a software object.

software.title: Software
software.description: Unique name of the software package.

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of a particular software.
version.comment: A string to identify a specific version of the software.

download_id.title: Download ID
download_id.description: The MD5 checksum, SHA-1 commit ID, image hash, or similar permanent identifier of the particular version of software used.
download_id.comment: Prefer SHA-1 of commit ID if available, otherwise use md5sum of downloaded software.

downloaded_url.title: Download URL
downloaded_url.description: An external resource to track the version of the software downloaded.
